6428.name: Cell 7
description: A cell in the Vector Prison.  It is very cold and wet inside this cell.
There is very little light inside here, but you can make out a small cot in
one corner, and two pales in another.  The sound of dripping water echos
around you.

6479.name: {MT{mhe {ML{mobby {MO{mf {MV{mector{x
description: You stand on the western side of the lobby directly east of the
center of the lobby itself.  To the west is a 20 foot statue of Kefka,
and to the northeast is the Throne Room Door.  Far south is the
Control Helm of the ship, and north, east and south is the main lobby.
A door stands to the east leading into the ship.

6481.name: {ML{mift {ME{mngine {MR{moom {MT{mhree{x
description: You enter through a large hatchway in the floor here.  In this room
is a metal catwalk leading into the Geomancer.  Directly south of the
catwalk is a massive engine, use to lift and hover the airship.

6455.name: {MT{mhe {ME{mast {MS{mtairwell {B[1st Level]{x
description: A stairwell here leads down to the next level in the airship.  Back
south is a hallway leading to the Entrance Hall.

6458.name: {MB{mefore {MT{mhe {MT{mhrone {MO{mf {MV{mector{x
description: The guards seem to be shocked by your presense.  One asks why you are
here.  To the north, a pair of large doors leads into the Throne Room.
Looking back, the main hall comes into view, its marble floors, and its iron
roof.

6427.name: Cell 8
description: A cell in the Vector Prison.  It is very cold and wet inside this cell.
There is very little light inside here, but you can make out a small cot in
one corner, and two pales in another.  The sound of dripping water echos
around you.

6425.name: {MT{mo {MT{mhe {MV{mectorian {MP{mrison{x
description: The hallway leads from the Geomancer's Stairwell to the Vectorian
Prison Office to the east.

6475.name: {ML{mift {ME{mngine {MR{moom {MO{mne{x
description: You enter through a large hatchway in the floor here.  In this room
is a metal catwalk leading into the Geomancer.  Directly south of the
catwalk is a massive engine, use to lift and hover the airship.

6490.name: {ML{mift {ME{mngine {MR{moom {MF{mour{x
description: You enter through a large hatchway in the floor here.  In this room
is a metal catwalk leading into the Geomancer.  Directly south of the
catwalk is a massive engine, use to lift and hover the airship.

6485.name: {ML{mift {ME{mngine {MR{moom {MS{meven{x
description: You enter through a large hatchway in the floor here.  In this room
is a metal catwalk leading into the Geomancer.  Directly south of the
catwalk is a massive engine, use to lift and hover the airship.

6431.name: Cell 4
description: A cell in the Vector Prison.  It is very cold and wet inside this cell.
There is very little light inside here, but you can make out a small cot in
one corner, and two pales in another.  The sound of dripping water echos
around you.

6420.name: The Execution Chamber
description: The room is filled with whips and chains, axes and maces.  In the center
of the room, a large rope hangs from the ceiling.  You see other things too.
Tables and straps, red hot pokes.  A truly cruel place.

6424.name: {MT{mo {MT{mhe {MV{mectorian {MP{mrison{x
description: The hallway leads from the Geomancer's Stairwell to the Vectorian
Prison Office to the west.

6419.name: Exe. Guard Post
description: The Guard Post.  For those who wish to rescue there friends.  A small
figure sits in one corner.

6457.name: {MT{mhe {ML{mobby {MO{mf {MV{mector{x
description: Directly north is the Throne Room Doors.  Two guards stand in front
of the doors, guarding their lord and master.  To the northeast and
northwest two hallways extend around the throne room, with the doors
in the walls, 20 feet from each other.  Directly south is the statue
of Kefka.

6483.name: {ML{mift {ME{mngine {MR{moom {MF{mive{x
description: You enter through a large hatchway in the floor here.  In this room
is a metal catwalk leading into the Geomancer.  Directly south of the
catwalk is a massive engine, use to lift and hover the airship.

6498.name: {ML{mift {ME{mngine {MR{moom {MS{mix{x
description: You enter through a large hatchway in the floor here.  In this room
is a metal catwalk leading into the Geomancer.  Directly south of the
catwalk is a massive engine, use to lift and hover the airship.

6423.name: {MT{mhe {MV{mectorian {MP{mrison{B [Main Office]{x
description: A small office stands here, with barred windows looking north over
the hallway leading down past all the cells.  A single desk sits in
the middle of the room covered with papers.  A few chairs sit around
for guests and other people from the airship.  Two hallways leads out
to the east and west.

6450.name: {MF{mirst {ML{mevel {MW{mest {MH{mallway{x
description: The hallway here is at an end.  A large staircase leads up to the
second floor of the Fortress of Vector.  To the east the hallway
continues into the main hall, and over to the eastern wing.  To the
north the door reads "Front Advisor Office Of Weapons" and to the
south you see the door to the "Front Advisor Office Of Research".  The
stairs lead up to the second floor.

6446.name: {MT{mhe {MH{mall {MO{mf {MV{mector{x
description: You stand within the Hall Of Vector.  Above you a large glass dome
encircles the whole hall.  All around you is white tiled floors, and
marble walls.  In the center of the hall, a large plant stands, with
soft benches surrounding it.  You notice other benches are dotting the
floor of the hall.  To the north, you see a small reception desk.
Behind the desk, two huge doors stand, leading into the Great Meeting
Hall.  To the East and West are hallways.

6478.name: {MT{mhe {ML{mobby {MO{mf {MV{mector{x
description: You stand on the eastern side of the Vectorian Lobby.  The lobby
stands to the south, extending in almost all directions.  Doors line
the wall, about 20 feet away from each other.  In the center of the
lobby is a large statue of Kefka.  Direction northwest are the doors
to the Throne Room.  To the southwest is the statue of Kefka.  To the
east is a door, and the rest of the directions is lobby.

6448.name: {MF{mirst {ML{mevel {ME{mast {MH{mallway{x
description: You are walking in the Eastern Hallway of Vector's lower east wing.
The hallway continues to the east and ends in a stair case.  On either
side of the hallway is a door.  To the north you see the door is for
the "Front Advisor Office Of Magitek".  The door to the south reads
"Front Advisor Office of Cities".  Back west is the Main Hall.

6417.name: Cell Block 1
description: To either side of you are barred doors.  Inside you see very nasty, and
poorly feed people.  The corridor goes north and south.

6489.name: Cell 1
description: You stand in a cold cell.  The cell is made from solid metal.  The only
thing in the cell is a toilet and a small cot.  No windows, and the only
light coming from a touch.  To the south is the door out.

6451.name: {MT{mhe {ML{mobby {MO{mf {MV{mector{x
description: This is the eastern side of the lobby running along the eastern
wall.  There is a door going into another part of the ship just above
every 20 feet.  To the north, west and south is the lobby.  To the
east is a door.

6439.name: {MT{mo {ME{mast {MS{mtairwell{x
description: A small hallway goes northwards towards a stairwell going down.  To
the west is the Entrance Hall.

6415.name: Cell Block 1
description: Desc To either side of you are barred doors.  Inside you see very nasty,
and poorly feed people.  The corridor goes north and south.

6445.name: {MT{mhe {MF{mortress {MO{mf {MV{mector{x
description: Before you stands two large iron doors of Vector, within the inner workings of
this vast empire. The doors stand 20 feet tall, going into the brown iron building.
Two guards stand by the sides of the door, standing still and watching you. You turn
around to see the village of Vector, only a staircase down, but still very far away.
To the southeast you see the Magitek Factory, and the back lots.

6493.name: Maintenance Closet
description: This room is filled with shelves.  On the sheleves are varies boxes
and tools for maintenance on the airship.  There is nothing else in
the room.

6488.name: Cell 2
description: You stand in a cold cell.  The cell is made from solid metal.  The only
thing in the cell is a toilet and a small cot.  No windows, and the only
light coming from a touch.  To the south is the door out.

6456.name: {MT{mhe {ML{mobby {MO{mf {MV{mector {B[{RC{renter{B]{x
description: You stand in the center of the vast lobby.  Before you stands a 20
foot replica of Kefka, emperor, ruler and mightest leader of Vector.
He stands in a pose, holding the world in his hands, and a grin on his
face.  At his feet, stands a model of the Fortress, which more works
out to be a map.  In all directions stands the Lobby Of Vector.

6437.name: {MT{mhe {ME{mntrance {MO{mf {MT{mhe {MG{meomancer{x
description: A large room opens up inside the airship.  Hallways on either side
of you go northwards to a location in the ship.  A stairwell goes up
from here to the main control room of the airship.  A short hallway
leads north to the main part of the Geomancer.

6435.name: Cell 1
description: A cell in the Vector Prison.  It is very cold and wet inside this cell.
There is very little light inside here, but you can make out a small cot in
one corner, and two pales in another.  The sound of dripping water echos
around you.

6454.name: {MT{mo {MW{mest {MS{mtairwell{x
description: A small hallway goes northwards towards a stairwell going down.  To
the east is the Entrance Hall.

6496.name: {MT{mhe {ME{mast {MS{mtairwell {B[2nd Level]{x
description: The stairwell comes down to the second level of the Geomancer.
Here once use to be the basement of the old Vectorian Fortress, now
converted into an on-board prison for the airship.  A hallway leads to
the west to the main office.

6480.name: {MT{mhe {ML{mobby {MO{mf {MV{mector{x
description: You stand on the eastern side of the lobby directly east of the
center of the lobby itself.  To the west is a 20 foot statue of Kefka,
and to the northwest is the Throne Room Door.  Far south is the
Control Helm of the ship, and north, west and south is the main lobby.
A door stands to the east leading into the ship.

6413.name: {MT{mhe {MW{mest {MS{mtairwell {B[2nd Level]{x
description: The stairwell comes down to the second level of the Geomancer.
Here once use to be the basement of the old Vectorian Fortress, now
converted into an on-board prison for the airship.  A hallway leads to
the east to the main office.

6416.name: Cell Block 1
description: To either side of you are barred doors.  Inside you see very nasty, and
poorly feed people.  The corridor goes north and south.

6421.name: Cell Block 2
description: To either side of you are barred doors.  Inside you see very nasty, and
poorly feed people.  The corridor goes north and south.

6418.name: Execution Audience Chamber
description: You stand inside the audience chamber, for executions.  You see a glass
window looking into the room, which is filled with all kinds of nasty
things.  A door lies to the north and east.

6449.name: {MF{mirst {ML{mevel {ME{mast {MH{mallway{x
description: You are at the end of the Eastern Wing East Hallway.  A large
staircase goes up leading to the second floor of the fortress.  Back
west is the hallway, and the Main Hall.  To the north, the door reads
"Front Advisor Office Of Towns".  To the south the door reads "Army
Recruiters Office".

6414.name: The Prison Of Vector
description: You stand inside The Prison Of Vector.  The stench of death hangs in the
air, and the sounds of moans and screams echo down through the hallways.
The Prison is dirty, wet and smells horrid.  To the north you see a long
hallway, with 6 cells to either side.  The words "Cell Block 1" hangs down
from the ceiling.  To the south, you see another long hallway, with 6 cells
to either side.  The words "Cell Block 2" hangs from the ceiling in that
direction.

6461.name: {MT{mhe {ML{mobby {MO{mf {MV{mector{x
description: You stand on the western side of the Vectorian Lobby.  The lobby
stands to the south, extending in almost all directions.  Doors line
the wall, about 20 feet away from each other.  In the center of the
lobby is a large statue of Kefka.  Direction northeast are the doors
to the Throne Room.  To the southeast is the statue of Kefka.  To the
west is a door, and the rest of the directions is lobby.

6477.name: {M[{m-{M> {MT{mHE {ML{mIGHT {MO{mF {MJ{mUDGEMENT {M<{m-{M]{x
description: A large control panel sits here, controling the city destroying
machine known as The Light Of Judgement

6438.name: {MT{mhe {MC{montrol {MH{melm {MO{mf {MT{mhe {MG{meomancer{x
description: Before you stands a massive room.  A huge control panel expands the
entire length of the room infront of huge windows looking out into the
world.  Large round stations are setup all over the room, with a large
throne like chair in the center.  The walls are covered with
mechanical panels and large pipes.  Some parts are covered in maps of
the realms.  A large steering helm stands in front of the throne like
chair.

6492.name: {ML{mift {ME{mngine {MR{moom {MT{mwo{x
description: You enter through a large hatchway in the floor here.  In this room
is a metal catwalk leading into the Geomancer.  Directly south of the
catwalk is a massive engine, use to lift and hover the airship.

6468.name: {ML{mift {ME{mngine {MR{moom {ME{might{x
description: You enter through a large hatchway in the floor here.  In this room
is a metal catwalk leading into the Geomancer.  Directly south of the
catwalk is a massive engine, use to lift and hover the airship.

6422.name: Cell Block 2
description: To either side of you are barred doors.  Inside you see very nasty, and
poorly feed people.  The corridor goes north and south.

6453.name: {MT{mhe {ML{mobby {MO{mf {MV{mector{x
description: You stand near the center of the Lobby.  All around you the lobby
stands looking the same.  The walls are totally covered in doors
leading to smaller places around the lobby.  Directly north is a
Statue of Kefka and the Throne Room.  The Master Control Helm is
south.

6432.name: Cell 5
description: A cell in the Vector Prison.  It is very cold and wet inside this cell.
There is very little light inside here, but you can make out a small cot in
one corner, and two pales in another.  The sound of dripping water echos
around you.

6474.name: Geomancer Electrical Closet
description: A small room opens up to alot of wires and panels.  Inside this
room is the technology control and electrical curcuits of the
Geomancer.  There is nothing else in the room.

6429.name: Cell 6
description: A cell in the Vector Prison.  It is very cold and wet inside this cell.
There is very little light inside here, but you can make out a small cot in
one corner, and two pales in another.  The sound of dripping water echos
around you.

6447.name: {MF{mirst {ML{mevel {MW{mest {MH{mallway{x
description: You are walking in the lower west wing of Vector.  On either side
of you is a small door leading into an office type area.  The hallway
continues to the west for a little, and at the end is stairs leading
to the second floor of the fortress.  To the north, the door reads
"Front Advisor Office Of Ports".  To the south, the door reads "Front
Advisor Office Of War".

6433.name: Cell 2
description: A cell in the Vector Prison.  It is very cold and wet inside this cell.
There is very little light inside here, but you can make out a small cot in
one corner, and two pales in another.  The sound of dripping water echos
around you.

6436.name: {MT{mo {MT{mhe {ML{mobby{x
description: A small hallway leads between the Entrance Hall and the Lobby of
Vector.  The Lobby of Vector is the central part of the ship.  To the
north is Kefka's Throne Room.  On the outside walls of the lobby are
offices and other rooms of the Vectorian Government.  Three hallways
make up the back of the ship, also filled with offices.  Inbetween all
these rooms are the Airship Engines and other mechanical stuff.

6434.name: Cell 3
description: A cell in the Vector Prison.  It is very cold and wet inside this cell.
There is very little light inside here, but you can make out a small cot in
one corner, and two pales in another.  The sound of dripping water echos
around you.

6452.name: {MT{mhe {ML{mobby {MO{mf {MV{mector{x
description: This is the western side of the lobby running along the western
wall.  There is a door going into another part of the ship just above
every 20 feet.  To the north, east and south is the lobby.  To the
west is a door.

6426.name: Cell 9
description: A cell in the Vector Prison.  It is very cold and wet inside this cell.
There is very little light inside here, but you can make out a small cot in
one corner, and two pales in another.  The sound of dripping water echos
around you.

6460.name: {MK{mefka's {MM{meeting/{MD{mining {MH{mall{x
description: This room is used to let Ganon meet people, world leaders ect.  A large
table with 14 chairs around it, stands in the center of the room.  On the
floor, a large red carpet covers most of the floor.  Along all of the walls
you see diffrent artifacts.  A statue, a suit of armor, some paintings...  A
large window over looks the northern courtyard.

6459.name: {MT{mhe {MV{mectorian {MT{mhrone {MR{moom {MO{mf {MK{mefka{x
description: The Throne Room Of Vector.  A large throne made from iron stand in the
center of the room.  Two large guards stand to either side of the throne.
The room is made from iron.  On the wall, large curtains showing off the
Vectorian Symbol hang.  Touches surround the room, burning away.  Behind the
throne, you see a door leading into a special area.  The way out, is south.

6463.name: {MT{mhe {MW{mest {MS{mtairwell {B[1st Level]{x
description: A stairwell here leads down to the next level in the airship.  Back
south is a hallway leading to the Entrance Hall.

6400.name: a guard of the fortress~
6400.room_name: A guard of the fortress is here ready and alert.

6401.name: the Captain of the Guards~
6401.room_name: A {#cavalier{x jumps to his feet upon your approach!

6402.name: a guard~
6402.d_flags: D {&Agghh! Defend the Fortress! Don't let them in!!{0~
6402.room_name: A guard stands here on patrol.

6403.name: (no short description)~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

6404.name: a vectorian prisoner~
description: He is dirty, and loves to steal.
6404.room_name: A Vectorian Prisoner looks at you with shifty eyes.

6405.name: The Gate Security Guard~
description:
You may pass this gate if you are a MagiTek Warrior or
have a Vectorian Pass. Just say in lower case letters
'entrance please'.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M SPEECH 6408 entrance please~
M GRALL 6417 100~
6405.room_name: The Security Guard of the main fortress gates stands here.

6408.name: A {MG{meomancer {ME{mlite {MG{muard{x~
subroutines:
F aff T
F off CFH
F imm L

6441.name: The Main Gate Guard~
description:
You may pass this gate if you are a MagiTek Warrior or
have a Vectorian Pass. Just say in lower case letters
'entrance please'.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
6441.room_name: The Main Gate Guard Stands Here.

6475.name: THE WAR MACHINE~
description:
A large iron beast stands before you, breathing steam.
A large creature, made from iron stands ready
to attack you. It stands two stories tall, and looks
like a large scorpion. Steams comes out of many
port holes, and its arms raise to the sky.
You have meet Vector's Defense against The TriPower.
Built With Anti-Makou Armor, You See Before You
The Vectorian War Machine.
6475.d_flags: D WARNING!! WARNING!! LOOSING STEAM POWER, SHUTTING DOWN, WARNING!!!~
6475.t_flags: T Greetings Flesh, Prepare To Get Crushed.~
6475.room_name: A large beast made from iron stands here, ready to beat the living shit out of YOU.

6468.name: The Prison Guard~
description:
You may pass this gate if you are a MagiTek Warrior or
have a Vectorian Pass. Just say in lower case letters
'entrance please'.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M SPEECH 6413 entrance please~
M GRALL 6417 100~
6468.room_name: The Security Guard for the Prison is here.

6440.name: The Security Guard of the Main Gates~
description:
You may pass this gate if you are a MagiTek Warrior or
have a Vectorian Pass. Just say in lower case letters
'entrance please'.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M SPEECH 6440 entrance please~
M GRALL 6417 100~
6440.room_name: The Security Guard of the Main Gates stands here.

6479.name: The MagiTek Clan Hall Guard~
description:
If you have a Vectorian Pass or Are a Magitek Member, just say
in lower case letters 'entrance please' and you will be tranfered
into the clan hall.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M SPEECH 6479 entrance please~
M GRALL 6417 100~
6479.room_name: The MagiTek Clan Hall Guard stands here.

6457.name: The Main Gate Security Guard~
description:
You may pass this gate if you are a MagiTek Warrior or
have a Vectorian Pass. Just say in lower case letters
'entrance please'.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M SPEECH 6457 entrance please~
M GRALL 6417 100~
6457.room_name: The Main Gate Security Guard stands here.

6458.name: The Throne Room Guard~
description:
MOB PROGRAM ALERT!
If you wish to seek audience with Kefka, say the following in lower
letters....
"i wish to see kefka"
 
The Mob will either respond yes and transfer you in, or no.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M SPEECH 6412 no~
M SPEECH 6410 i wish to see kefka~
M GRALL 6409 100~
M SPEECH 6414 yes sir~
M SPEECH 6411 yes i will~
6458.room_name: The Security Guard Of The Throne Room stands here.

6459.name: Kefka's Personal Guard stands here.~
description:
Mob Prog Alert!
To Leave This Room say in lower case...
'i will go now'
 
This mob will follow Kefka too.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M SPEECH 6415 i will go now~
M SPEECH 6416 follow me~

6462.name: The Prison Security Guard~
description:
You may pass this gate if you are a MagiTek Warrior or
have a Vectorian Pass. Just say in lower case letters
'entrance please'.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M SPEECH 6462 entrance please~
M GRALL 6417 100~
6462.room_name: The Prison Security Guard stands here.
